headline: Survey reveals top LTL carriers for 2025
summary: Old Dominion Freight Line was named as the top national carrier for a 16th straight year by Mastio & Co. The post Survey reveals top LTL carriers for 2025 appeared first on FreightWaves.

raw.headline: Survey reveals top LTL carriers for 2025
raw.summary: Old Dominion Freight Line was named as the top national carrier for a 16th straight year by Mastio & Co. The post Survey reveals top LTL carriers for 2025 appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Old Dominion Freight Line Selected #1 National LTL Carrier for Quality for a Record Breaking 16 Years Straight
summary: THOMASVILLE, N.C., October 07, 2025--Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. (OD), a leading less-than-truckload (LTL) freight shipping company, has been selected as the #1 National LTL Carrier for Quality by Mastio & Company for the 16th consecutive year. Through this comprehensive annual survey, shipping experts selected OD as the top carrier for quality based on performance. This year’s results again put OD at the top for quality where it has remained since 2010.
